text: Rick Bowness confirms Scott Wedgewood will start tonight against his former team the Arizona Coyotes.
Scott Wedgewood will be in goal tonight for the Stars Rick Bowness said.
Scott Wedgewood will start in net tonight as the Stars play Arizona with a chance to clinch a playoff spot per Rick Bowness.
